items.title: In Some New York Prisons, Infirmaries Are Dens of Hidden Violence
items.description: After guards beat Robert Brooks to death in December, The Marshall Project found dozens more allegations of abuse in medical rooms lacking cameras.

items.title: Trump’s New Order on Policing Seems Sweeping. But What Will It Really Change?
items.description: The president’s directive may please some law enforcement officials, but some experts say certain provisions are redundant and ignore how police agenc...

items.title: Trump’s Anti-DEI Push Raises Concerns Among Black Officers in Local Police Departments
items.description: DEI professionals and officers of color fear that a Trump-led backlash will erase the diversity gains made after the George Floyd protests.

items.title: Not In Our Backyard: Some Pro-Trump Towns Push Against Detention Centers
items.description: Opposition to an immigration detention center in Leavenworth, Kansas, illustrates a tension playing out across the country.

items.title: The Marshall Project Named Finalist for 2025 Goldsmith Prize for Investigative Reporting
items.description: The reporting exposed the impact of widespread drug testing on pregnant people.
